summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6116 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West from West McGraw Street to West Smith Street on the east; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84527, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
